attributes.action: force the CPS/Police service to bring a case against BT and Phorm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The secret trials run by BT and Phorm against their customers was illegal under the Regulation of Investigatory Powers Act and we the undersigned would like the Government to force the police to uphold the law of the land.  Not arbitarily decide that the intent of the law, that consent is required, be ignored.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
